title: Throttle Body Plate (butterfly) - check/clean

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Throttle body removal D71; D74; DR4; DS1; DS4; DSA; DSB; DSX
Throttle Body and Inlet Manifold Assembly - Removal

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DS4; DR4; D74; D71; DSB; DSA; DSX; DS1

body.body: Using a lint free cloth and a suitable degreaser such as Castrol Motorcycle Parts Cleaner, remove any residue from the internal surfaces and throttle plate (butterfly).
Check for any signs of damage and ensure the butterfly moves correctly.
Throttle Body Install - D71; D74; DR4; DS1; DS4; DSA; DSB; DSX
Throttle Body and Inlet Manifold Assembly - Installation

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DS4; DR4; D74; D71; DSB; DSA; DSX; DS1

search: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Throttle Body and Inlet Manifold Assembly - Removal
Using a lint free cloth and a suitable degreaser such as Castrol Motorcycle Parts Cleaner, remove any residue from the internal surfaces and throttle plate (butterfly).
Check for any signs of damage and ensure the butterfly moves correctly.
Throttle Body and Inlet Manifold Assembly - Installation
